page.title: 20LIKE/DISLIKE VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: We asked people living in Rodmarton, Culkerton and Ashley from our block what they liked and disliked about village life. {Likes }were Peace & quiet:Open fields:Safe places for children to play:Friendly village where people help each other:Village school where parents & children know everyone:It has always been home: Slow pace of life:Sound of local accent. {Dislikes}were in many cases none some said Feudal system:Too far from shops:No pub: Muddy roads in winter: Walkways farmed over:Medieval sewage system & lack of social amenities. {Leisure activities:}Gardening,walking cycling,reading,sewing,knitting,dog shows, horse riding,watching T.V. chatting,visiting,fishing,shooting, bingo,skittles,swimming,golf,squash.
